application

Class ProductManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • application.ProductManager

  • public class ProductManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is intended to manage Products and Product Categories and is accessed by Administrator and Inventory
    Author:
    group_0549

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProductManager(Inventory inventory)
      This method initializes a new ProductManager and loads the file of products

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCategoryToFile(ProductCategory pc)
      This method adds a ProductCategory to first line of the file, even if there is not product in that category.
      void addProduct(Product p, java.lang.String name)
      This method adds a product to the list of products and the product file It also adds the product with 0 quantity to all the distribution centers
      void addProductCategory(ProductCategory pcat)
      This method adds a product category to the list of product category
      void addtoDistributionCenters(Product p)
      This method adds a product to every distribution center and sets the quantity to 0
      void addToSales(Product p, java.lang.Integer quantity)
      This method creates a sale for the product, adds the product to list of sales
      void categoryProductList()
      This method creates the Category and Product HashMap by iterating through the list of product categories and setting them and their value as the product list in each category
      void changeProductDescription(Product p, java.lang.String description)
      This method changes the product description to the one specified and changes the product description in the file
      void changeProductPicture(Product p, java.lang.String photo)
      This method changes the photo of the product to the parameter photo
      void changeProductPrice(Product p, double price)
      This method changes the product price to the one specified and changes the product price in the file
      void changeProductQuantity(Product p, int quantity, boolean add)
      This method increases or decreases the product quantity by the one specified according to add and changes the product quantity in the file
      void changeProductQuantityGui(Product p, int quantity)
      This method changes the product quantity to the one specified and changes the product quantity in the file
      ProductCategory getCategoryByDescription(java.lang.String description)
      This method returns a Product Category from the list of all Categories that contains the description specified and if no ProductCategory exists with that description, then returns null
      java.util.ArrayList<ProductCategory> getCategoryList()
      This method returns all the product categories in a list
      java.util.HashMap<ProductCategory,java.util.ArrayList<Product>> getCategoryProductList()
      This method returns a HashMap of all the Product Categories as keys and an ArrayList of all their products as the value
      java.util.ArrayList<Product> getProductList()
      This method returns all the products in a list
      java.util.HashMap<Product,java.lang.Integer> getSales()
      This method returns the list of products that are sold
      void loadFile()
      This method loads the file, by creating a new product and product category for each one in the file and adding them to the list of products and list of product categories, respectively

      • getCategoryProductList

        public java.util.HashMap<ProductCategory,java.util.ArrayList<Product>> getCategoryProductList()
        This method returns a HashMap of all the Product Categories as keys and an ArrayList of all their products as the value
        Returns:
        -> HashMap of Product Categories and the ArrayList of Products in each category

      • categoryProductList

        public void categoryProductList()
        This method creates the Category and Product HashMap by iterating through the list of product categories and setting them and their value as the product list in each category

                                  int quantity,

        quantity - -> the number of quantity that the product quantity is set to
        add - -> true if we add quantity, false if we subtract

      • getCategoryByDescription

        public ProductCategory getCategoryByDescription(java.lang.String description)
        This method returns a Product Category from the list of all Categories that contains the description specified and if no ProductCategory exists with that description, then returns null
        Parameters:
        description - -> the description of the ProductCategory to be found
        Returns:
        -> Product Category with the description specified if it exists, else returns null

      • loadFile

        public void loadFile()
        This method loads the file, by creating a new product and product category for each one in the file and adding them to the list of products and list of product categories, respectively

      • addCategoryToFile

        public void addCategoryToFile(ProductCategory pc)
        This method adds a ProductCategory to first line of the file, even if there is not product in that category.
        Parameters:
        pc - -> name of the ProductCategory that is added to the file

      • addToSales

        public void addToSales(Product p,

        This method creates a sale for the product, adds the product to list of sales
        Parameters:

        quantity - -> the amount of the product sold

        public java.util.HashMap<Product,java.lang.Integer> getSales()
